summary: The Equal COLA Act, introduced in the Senate, aims to equalize cost-of-living adjustments (COLAs) for federal employee annuities. It amends Title 5 of the United States Code to ensure consistent COLA increases between the Federal Employees Retirement System (FERS) and the Civil Service Retirement System (CSRS). The bill applies the adjustment to existing and future annuities commencing before, on, or after the enactment date.
